member.summary: Settings that will be passed to package.

member.summary: Allows data import process to be skipped if true, the process is skipped, if false, it is not. Default is false. for this to function, it needs to be set in or before the PreImport function call

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xrm.Tooling.PackageDeployment.CrmPackageExtentionBase.IImportExtensions2.OverrideDataImportSafetyChecks
member.summary: Allows a package developer to skip data validation on Complex data imports The net effect is that import is much faster at the cost of the potential data collisions

member.summary: Raised before the named solution is imported to allow for any configuration settings to be made to the import process
member.param: name of the solution about to be imported.
If set to true, imports the Solution with Override Customizations enabled
If set to true, attempts to auto publish workflows and activities as part of solution deployment

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xrm.Tooling.PackageDeployment.CrmPackageExtentionBase.IImportExtensions2.OverrideConfigurationDataFileLanguage(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32})
member.summary: Allows the currently selected language for data import to be overridden by a user selection. if the LCID is not found, the developer selection is ignored and the default language import is used.
member.param: Current LCID that will be used for import, if 0 then default will be used.
List of languages that are in the package.
member.returns: Requested LCID to be used. if 0, the default will be used. if the requested LCID is not found, a warning will be logged and the default language will be used.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xrm.Tooling.PackageDeployment.CrmPackageExtentionBase.ImportExtension.OverrideConfigurationDataFileLanguage(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32})
member.summary: Allows the currently selected language for data import to be overridden by a user selection. if the LCID is not found, the developer selection is ignored and the default language import is used.
member.param: Current LCID that will be used for import, if 0 then default will be used.
List of languages that are in the package.
member.returns: Requested LCID to be used. if 0, the default will be used. if the requested LCID is not found, a warning will be logged and the default language will be used.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xrm.Tooling.PackageDeployment.CrmPackageExtentionBase.ImportExtension.OverrideSolutionImportDecision(System.String,System.Version,System.Version,System.Version,System.Version,Microsoft.Xrm.Tooling.PackageDeployment.CrmPackageExtentionBase.ImportAction)
member.summary: Called by the Solution Import subsystem after a decision is made by the import system.
member.param: Unique name of the solution
Version of the organization that is being targeted
Solution package version, indicates the minimum version of CRM that this package is available for
Version of the solution ( if present ) found on the server
Version of the solution that has been requested for import
Action decided by the package deployment system
member.returns: Package developer override decision or default
